title: Wooden Crucible
description: The **Wooden Crucible** will extract water out of plants and fruits, making it an alternative to rain.

Crafting.content: The Wooden Crucible can be crafted out of any of the Vanilla wood logs and will take on their texture accordingly. The kind of slab used at the bottom of the recipe does not make a difference.

Usage.content: Right-click the crucible with a supported material to insert it. It will slowly convert it to water over time.
